TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LinkTarget extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示某页上的一个元素，可以从其他文档或同一文档中的其他位置链接到该元素。

span.span: Represents an element on a page that can be linked to from other documents or other places in the same document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中所有页面的所有链接目标的名称 将收集到文档的页面内容部分 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 。The names of all of the link targets for all of the pages in a are gathered into the Page Content part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 这样，便可以使用应用程序来确定特定的目标是否在特定的文档中，而无需加载整个文档。This enables consuming applications to determine if a particular target is in a particular document without having to load the entire document. 有关和元素的详细 `` 信息 `` ，请参阅 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 可在 [XPS：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)中获取的规范的第3章。For more information about the `` and `` elements, see chapter 3 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

summary.span: 获取或设置此 标识为可链接元素的元素名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the element that this identifies as a linkable element.

value.span: 一个 ，与对应于此 元素的标记元素的 属性相同。

span.span: A that is identical to the property of the markup element that corresponds to this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中所有页面的所有链接目标的名称 将收集到文档的页面内容部分 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 。The names of all of the link targets for all of the pages in a are gathered into the Page Content part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 这样，便可以使用应用程序来确定特定的目标是否在特定的文档中，而无需加载整个文档。This enables consuming applications to determine if a particular target is in a particular document without having to load the entire document. 有关和元素的详细 `` 信息 `` ，请参阅 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 可在 [XPS：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)中获取的规范的第3章。For more information about the `` and `` elements, see chapter 3 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
